knimeNode.name: openBIS Aggregated Data File Importer
knimeNode.shortDescription: Imports a data file from special openBIS aggregation services.

fullDescription.intro:
This data source node invokes a special openBIS aggregation services which creates from some input parameters a file which is delivered to the node at execution time.
For more details see openBIS KNIME Nodes.

ports.outPort: URI of the imported data file.
